tasks.title: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Set up the base Next.js project structure with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS for styling, and essential configurations for SEO and performance.
tasks.details: npx create-next-app@latest conversion-calculator --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app; Configure next.config.js for images and headers; Set up base layout with specified color palette (#FFFFFF bg, #333333 text, #4A90E2 primary); Implement system fonts (Inter or system-ui); Add global CSS resets and base styles matching PRD color scheme.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project builds without errors (npm run build); Check Tailwind styles apply correctly on sample components; Confirm TypeScript compilation passes; Test responsive viewport meta tags present.

tasks.title: Create shared UI components and conversion utilities
tasks.description: Build reusable components (Header, Footer, ConverterWidget) and core conversion formulas for all unit types.
tasks.details: Create /components/Header.tsx with logo and nav; /components/Footer.tsx with About/Contact/Privacy/Terms links; /components/ConverterWidget.tsx with From input, unit dropdowns, To result (read-only), real-time conversion; Implement conversion formulas: lbsToKg=(lbs*0.453592), ozToG=(oz*28.3495), inToCm=(in*2.54), ftToM=(ft*0.3048), fToC=((f-32)*5/9), lToMl=(l*1000), galToL=(gal*3.78541) and reverses; Use React hooks for real-time calculation.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test all conversion formulas with known values (e.g., 1lb=0.453592kg within 6 decimals); Test ConverterWidget renders correctly; Verify real-time updates on input change; Test dropdown value persistence.

tasks.title: Implement Homepage layout and category cards
tasks.description: Build responsive homepage with header, search placeholder, category grid (Weight/Length/Temp/Volume), ad placeholder, and footer.
tasks.details: Create /app/page.tsx; Implement category cards linking to: Weight→/weight/pounds-to-kilograms, Length→/length/inches-to-centimeters, etc.; Add non-functional search input 'Search a conversion…'; Include ad placeholder div (300x250 banner style); Use CSS Grid for responsive category layout (2-col desktop, 1-col mobile); Ensure semantic HTML with proper headings.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all category cards render and link correctly; Test responsive breakpoints (desktop/tablet/mobile); Confirm search input placeholder displays; Check ad placeholder sizing/responsiveness; Lighthouse SEO score ≥90.

tasks.title: Create Weight conversion pages infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement Pounds↔Kilograms and Ounces↔Grams converter pages with SEO metadata and layouts.
tasks.details: Create /app/weight/pounds-to-kilograms/page.tsx and ounces-to-grams/page.tsx; Use ConverterWidget with preconfigured units; Add SEO: title='Pounds to Kilograms Converter', meta description; Include explanation text and 2 related links each; Right sidebar ad placeholder (desktop), bottom ad (mobile); Use kebab-case URLs as specified.
tasks.testStrategy: Test accurate conversions (2lb=0.907184kg, 1oz=28.3495g); Verify SEO titles/descriptions unique; Confirm responsive ad placement switches correctly; Test related links navigate properly.

tasks.title: Create Length conversion pages infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement Inches↔Centimeters and Feet↔Meters converter pages with proper SEO and layouts.
tasks.details: Create /app/length/inches-to-centimeters/page.tsx and feet-to-meters/page.tsx; Preconfigure dropdowns for each pair; Add unique SEO metadata; Include brief explanation sections; Add related conversions (cross-category links); Implement responsive ad placeholders.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify conversions (1in=2.54cm, 1ft=0.3048m); Test mobile/desktop ad layouts; Confirm semantic HTML structure (h1 per page); Validate related links point to existing pages.

tasks.title: Create Temperature and Volume conversion pages
tasks.description: Complete remaining converters: Fahrenheit↔Celsius, Liters↔Milliliters, Gallons↔Liters with full page implementations.
tasks.details: Create /app/temperature/fahrenheit-to-celsius/page.tsx; /app/volume/liters-to-milliliters/page.tsx; /app/volume/gallons-to-liters/page.tsx; Implement all with consistent layout pattern; Add category-specific explanations; Ensure proper reverse conversions work bidirectionally.
tasks.testStrategy: Test conversions: 32F=0C, 1L=1000mL, 1gal=3.78541L; Verify all 8 pages load with correct titles; Confirm bidirectional conversion accuracy; Test input validation (numbers only).

tasks.title: Implement responsive design and mobile optimization
tasks.description: Ensure all pages are fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile with large tap targets and optimal layouts.
tasks.details: Use Tailwind responsive classes (sm:, md:, lg:); Ensure converter inputs ≥44px touch targets; Mobile: stack ad below converter, single column layout; Tablet: 2-column possible; Desktop: sidebar ads; Test on common breakpoints (320px, 768px, 1024px+); Optimize font sizes for readability.
tasks.testStrategy: Chrome DevTools responsive testing all pages; Verify touch targets ≥44px; Test landscape/portrait rotation; Confirm no horizontal scroll; Lighthouse mobile score ≥90.

tasks.title: Add comprehensive SEO metadata to all pages
tasks.description: Implement unique title tags, meta descriptions, canonical URLs, and semantic HTML structure for all 9 pages.
tasks.details: Use Next.js Metadata API; Homepage: 'Unit Converter - Fast Accurate Conversions'; Each converter: '[From] to [To] Converter - Free Online Tool'; Meta descriptions 150-160 chars with keywords; Structured headings (h1=converter name, h2=sections); Open Graph tags; Robots.txt and sitemap.xml generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify unique titles/descriptions via page source; Test Google Rich Results validator; Confirm semantic HTML (axe/lighthouse audit); Check sitemap includes all URLs.

tasks.title: Implement accessibility features (a11y)
tasks.description: Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and sufficient contrast.
tasks.details: Add proper ARIA labels to inputs/dropdowns/buttons; Ensure focus management in converter widget; Keyboard-navigable dropdowns; Color contrast ≥4.5:1 (check #333 on #FFF, #4A90E2 buttons); Form labels associated with inputs; Skip-to-content link.
tasks.testStrategy: Run axe DevTools audit (0 critical errors); Test keyboard navigation (tab through all interactive elements); NVDA/VoiceOver screen reader testing; Contrast checker validation.

tasks.title: Add performance optimizations and Core Web Vitals
tasks.description: Optimize for ≤2s first meaningful paint, meet Core Web Vitals, and ensure 4G mobile performance.
tasks.details: Next.js Image component for logo; Lazy load below-fold content; Preload critical fonts; Code splitting with dynamic imports; Minify CSS/JS; GZIP compression; Service worker for caching (optional); Critical CSS inlining.
tasks.testStrategy: Lighthouse Performance ≥90 (mobile 4G emulation); PageSpeed Insights validation; Web Vitals monitoring setup; Verify TTFB <600ms.

tasks.title: Implement basic analytics tracking
tasks.description: Add pageview tracking for all pages using a lightweight analytics solution.
tasks.details: Integrate Simple Analytics or Umami (privacy-friendly); Track page views, referrer, device type; No personal data collection; Cookie consent banner if required; Events for conversion calculations performed.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics script loads; Test pageview events fire on navigation; Confirm no PII collected; Check consent banner functionality.

tasks.title: Add cookie consent banner and privacy compliance
tasks.description: Implement minimal cookie banner for analytics compliance (GDPR/CCPA ready).
tasks.details: Use react-cookie-consent or custom; Banner text: 'We use cookies for analytics. Accept?'; Persist preference in localStorage; Block analytics until consent; Links to Privacy policy page.
tasks.testStrategy: Test banner displays on first visit; Verify analytics blocked pre-consent; Confirm preference persists across sessions; Test Privacy page link works.

tasks.title: Create documentation and style guide
tasks.description: Document setup instructions, build process, and style guide matching PRD specifications.
tasks.details: Create README.md with: npm install, npm run dev/build/start; Deploy instructions (Vercel/Netlify); Style guide: colors (#FFFFFF/#333333/#4A90E2/#7FA99B/#F5F5F5), typography (system fonts), spacing (Tailwind scale); Component usage examples.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all commands work as documented; Style guide matches live site; Deployment instructions tested on staging.

tasks.title: End-to-end testing and QA across all converters
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all 8 converters, navigation, and core user flows.
tasks.details: Cypress/Playwright tests for: homepage→converter navigation, all conversion pairs (10 test values each), responsive layouts, form inputs (valid/invalid), related links; Test edge cases (0, decimals, large numbers); Cross-browser testing.
tasks.testStrategy: 100% test coverage of core flows; All converters accurate within 10^-6; No console errors; All links functional.

tasks.title: Production deployment and monitoring setup
tasks.description: Deploy to production domain with HTTPS, monitoring, and post-launch verification.
tasks.details: Deploy to Vercel/Netlify with custom domain; Force HTTPS; Set up error monitoring (Sentry); Performance monitoring (Vercel Analytics); Verify all URLs work; Submit sitemap to Google Search Console; Check Core Web Vitals in production.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all 9 pages live and functional; HTTPS enforced; Load times ≤2s; No 404s; Analytics receiving data; Search Console indexing.
